name: My 1st day of middle school won't begin
name_original: My 1st day of middle school won't begin
description:
Music: justanotherpiccplayer
https://justanotherpiccplayer.itch.io/

Other: Elfaquin
https://elfaquin.itch.io/

___

This project was made for the Cozy Autumn game jam.

I struggled finishing in time, so it might be a little buggy.

Controls : Use the arrow keys and the mouse.

I used both the optional palette and the optional mechanic ! The game was originally planned to be way more complex, but I struggled a lot implementing actual puzzles so it looks more like a demo ><
Speedrunable sub 1 minute !
